==Useful Info==
'''Occultists''' are spell casters who can roast you with Fireballs or banish you into the [[Abyss]]. Fortunately, they are flimsy. They can be found in late [[Dungeon]] and [[Depths]].

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Occultists can deal high damage, but they aren't too [[ev]]asive, cannot [[see invisible]], and don't have much [[willpower]].
*[[Banishment]] requires line of fire, and can be defeated by high enough [[willpower]] of your own. Fire resistance is helpful to defend against [[Fireball]]s, too.
*A [[silence]]d or [[waterlog]]ged occultist can only do weak melee attacks.

==History==
*In [[0.31]], occultists were added to the game, split off from [[wizard (monster)|wizards]].
